casename: National Skin Centre (Singapore) Pte Ltd v Eutech Cybernetics Pte Ltd
counsel: Chan Kia Peng, Carolyn Bava and Esther Ling (Khattar Wong & Partners) for the plaintiff; Johnny Cheo (Cheo Yeoh & Associates) for the defendant
tags-parsed: Contract/Discharge/Breach/Contract to commission computer system with customised software/Time of the essence/Failure to commission system by original deadline/Election not to terminate/Subsequent notice to make time of essence again/Reasonableness of notice/Validity of termination/Whether notice of terminated required
